pullrequest.title: save configuration to the default location on exit

content.raw:
~~Is it OK to compare the `<window>` section in the saved configuration file with the current `<window>` value? Well, that won't capture individual plugin changes (e.g.: moving the user camera).~~

~~It's not elegant but we could compare the entire content of the saved configuration file with the current configuration. Will that work as an alternative to always show the dialog?~~
content.html:
Is it OK to compare the <window> section in the saved configuration file with the current <window> value? Well, that won't capture individual plugin changes (e.g.: moving the user camera).

It's not elegant but we could compare the entire content of the saved configuration file with the current configuration. Will that work as an alternative to always show the dialog?
